performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate (Bread)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of dough produced that successfully transforms into finished bread. Accounts for waste due to defects, under-proofing, or over-proofing.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (Finished Bread)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of water in the finished bread product. Critical for shelf life and texture. Measured using Karl Fischer titration.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³)
performance_metrics.description: Volume of the internal crumb structure of the bread. Influenced by fermentation time, dough hydration, and baking conditions.

performance_metrics.name: Specific Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of the bread's airiness. Higher values indicate a lighter texture.

performance_metrics.name: Crust Hardness (Shore A)
performance_metrics.description: Measured using a Shore A durometer. Indicates crust crispness and resistance to breakage.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: Time the bread remains acceptable for sale, considering moisture content, crust integrity, and microbial activity.  Requires controlled temperature (20-24°C) and humidity (60-70%).

performance_metrics.name: Baking Time (Loaf)
performance_metrics.description: Total time from initial loading to finished baking. Dependent on oven type and loaf size.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: Capacity of the dough mixer, considering batch size and production volume.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofer Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Temperature of the proofer, crucial for yeast activity and dough development.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofer Humidity
implementation_requirements.description: Relative humidity within the proofer, maintaining optimal dough hydration.

implementation_requirements.name: Oven Type
implementation_requirements.specification: Convection Oven with Independent Temperature Zones
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for precise control of baking temperature and humidity, ensuring uniform bread quality.

implementation_requirements.name: Scale Accuracy
implementation_requirements.description: Accuracy of the scale used for measuring ingredients.

implementation_requirements.name: Ingredient Storage
implementation_requirements.description: Ingredients must be stored under conditions that maintain their quality and prevent spoilage.

implementation_requirements.name: Cleaning and Sanitation Procedures
implementation_requirements.description: Automated cleaning system for equipment, adhering to HACCP principles.

industry_standards: HACCP (Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points)
operational_considerations: Raw Material Sourcing (Wheat Flour, Yeast, Water, Salt)
